items.text: I am _%team%_ bot 🤖 and here to help you Connect with new people in your Organization. Every Month, if you optin to the program I will randomly match you to a new colleague.
Oh btw, by default I won't send you more messages, just send **optin** or **optout** anytime, but I seriously hope you decide to participate 🤞. Cheers! Until next time 👋
